Resources

This page contains all the additional resources relevant for introductory quantitative finance course. Resources are added as and when they are relevant for the topics covered in the course.

Classic Textbook : This book on quantitative risk management is a classic with very concise and comprehensive introduction to the subject of quantitative risk management. Please find it here.
